text: Abdel Qawi Khalifa is an Egyptian engineer and professor. He has degrees in civil engineering and petroleum engineering from universities in Egypt, Canada, and the United States. He has worked as a consultant for the Egyptian government and owned his own engineering office. He was also chairman of a government water company and governor of Cairo. In 2012, he became the minister of water and wastewater utilities. He left that position in 2013. He is back again to share the KCE company from 2013 until now. == References == Category:1972 births Category:Egyptian businesspeople Category:Egyptian politicians Category:Living people
title: Abdel Qawi Khalifa
